CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 2, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "'Carmen' takes the Air - 'Backstage at the Nixon.' Polly Rowles' Station WCAE air show was unusually good Monday night when principals of the 'Carmen Jones' cast crossed verbs with musical experts....Lads of the street scene. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group of eight boys wearing suits, actors in street scene in "Carmen Jones," seated around square tables, in interior with large window and dark stripe around room
